-e ---

𓄞 vulva / fat

  1. Scheide ≈ ዘይት zäyt 𓄞 𓂧 𓐏
  2. Fotze ≈ fat 𓎙 𓂧 𓏌 𓏥
  3. cunt ≈ ⲕⲉⲛⲓⲱⲧ 𓈎 𓈖 𓄃

Scheide ≈ zäyt

𓋴 𓄞 𓂧 Scheide <> Spalt 𓂏 𓂎 𓄞 𓂧 𓊌 Scheide “vulva”

𓄞 𓂧 𓐏 | fat | زَيْت zayt 𓎙 𓂧 𓏌 𓏥 | fat | ዘይት zäyt
𓎙 𓂧 𓏌 𓏥 | fat | زَيْت zayt
𓎙 𓂧 𓏌 𓏥 | fat | ზეთი zeti
𓎙 𓂧 𓏌 𓏥 | fat | ձեթ jetʿ
𓎙 𓂧 𓏌 𓏥 | fat | ϧⲟⲧ ↔ ϧⲑⲁⲓ , ϧⲟⲑ ↔ ϧⲑⲁⲓ

supported by 𓋴 𓄞 𓂧 and 𓄞 ≈ 𓈙 in 𓅱 𓄞 𓂧 𓀁 | question 𓅱 𓈙 𓂧 𓀁 | question

vagina ≈ cunt ≈ ⲕⲉⲛⲓⲱⲧ

𓄞 𓂧 𓄹 | vulva | Scheide •čuĩd|cunt Schneide 𓄞 𓂧 𓄹 | vagina| cunt (vulgar)

𓄞 𓂧 𓅭 𓏥 | waterfowl | sauvagine

𓈎 𓈖 𓄃 | fat | ⲕⲉⲛⲓ ↔ ⲕⲉⲛⲓⲱⲧ ⲕⲉⲛⲓⲱⲟⲩⲧ !
𓈎 𓈖 𓄃 | fat | ქონი koni χονδρός khondrós ⇔ ϧⲟⲧ ↔ ϧⲑⲁⲓ •jõt

Fotze ≈ fat

𓄞 𓂧 𓄹 | vulva | Fotze (vulgar!)

𓄞 𓂧 𓐏 | fat |

𓄞 𓂧 𓄛 fata = waterskin @ Hausa
𓄞 𓂧 𓄛 fata ⇔ 𓃀 𓅡 𓄇 𓄛 (leo)parden Haut

Scharte

Scheide < Scharte < Sparte 𓂏 𓂎

𒄯𒁕𒌅 ˢḫur-da-tu Scheide (i < r alphabetic-change ) 𒄯𒁕𒌅 ᵖḫur-daⁿtu “pudenda” (vulva)

Schutz

cut

cut <> scheid <> schneid 𓄞 𓂧 𓀜 | take away, remove, cut out, dig (lake), rescue, salvage (boat) | scheiden ≈ schneiden 𓄞 𓂧 𓀜 | stave off (event), pull (on), exact (dues), ransack (a country), apportion (field- plots) | scheiden
